mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, star, comment_group, deleted, LECTURE_REVIEW.regdate, profile FROM LECTURE_REVIEW INNER JOIN users ON LECTURE_REVIEW.writer=users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_REVIEW (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate, star) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group},#{comment_group}, SYSDATE, #{star})
